sentences.sContent: You can do this in your home town.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can do this in your home town.
sentences.sCn: 在自己的家乡你就能做到这些。

sentences.sContent: Even if you've never been outside of your home town, say you've been anywhere.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even if you've never been outside of your home town, say you've been anywhere.
sentences.sCn: 即使你从没有远离过你的家乡，你也可以说你到过的任何地方。

trans.tranOther: the place where you were born and spent your childhood
